name: CUSTOM Before/after #12
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign toggles_gap = section.settings.toggles_gap
  assign toggles_gap_mobile = section.settings.toggles_gap_mobile
  assign toggles_mt = section.settings.toggles_mt
  assign toggles_mt_mobile = section.settings.toggles_mt_mobile

  assign toggles_autoplay_delay = section.settings.toggles_autoplay_delay
  assign autoplay = section.settings.autoplay

  assign toggle_size = section.settings.toggle_size
  assign toggle_size_mobile = section.settings.toggle_size_mobile

  assign circle_color = section.settings.circle_color
  assign circle_active_color = section.settings.circle_active_color

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect

  assign slider_mt = section.settings.slider_mt
  assign slider_mt_mobile = section.settings.slider_mt_mobile

  assign card_border_thickness = section.settings.card_border_thickness
  assign card_border_color = section.settings.card_border_color
  assign card_bg_color = section.settings.card_bg_color
  assign card_radius = section.settings.card_radius

  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile

  assign badge_custom = section.settings.badge_custom
  assign badge_font = section.settings.badge_font
  assign badge_size = section.settings.badge_size
  assign badge_size_mobile = section.settings.badge_size_mobile
  assign badge_height = section.settings.badge_height
  assign badge_color = section.settings.badge_color  
  assign badge_bg_color = section.settings.badge_bg_color
  assign badge_padding_horizontal = section.settings.badge_padding_horizontal  
  assign badge_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.badge_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign badge_padding_vertical = section.settings.badge_padding_vertical  
  assign badge_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.badge_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign badge_radius = section.settings.badge_radius
  assign badge_border_thickness = section.settings.badge_border_thickness
  assign badge_border_color = section.settings.badge_border_color

  assign content_align = section.settings.content_align
  assign content_align_mobile = section.settings.content_align_mobile
  assign content_padding_horizontal = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal  
  assign content_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign content_padding_vertical = section.settings.content_padding_vertical  
  assign content_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_vertical_mobile

  assign content_horizontal_align = ""
  if content_align == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif content_align == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if content_align_mobile == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif content_align_mobile == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color   
  
  assign caption_custom = section.settings.caption_custom
  assign caption_font = section.settings.caption_font
  assign caption_size = section.settings.caption_size
  assign caption_size_mobile = section.settings.caption_size_mobile
  assign caption_height = section.settings.caption_height
  assign caption_color = section.settings.caption_color 
  assign caption_mt = section.settings.caption_mt
  assign caption_mt_mobile = section.settings.caption_mt_mobile

  assign tags_custom = section.settings.tags_custom
  assign tags_font = section.settings.tags_font
  assign tags_size = section.settings.tags_size
  assign tags_size_mobile = section.settings.tags_size_mobile
  assign tags_height = section.settings.tags_height
  assign tags_color = section.settings.tags_color  
  assign tags_bg_color = section.settings.tags_bg_color
  assign tags_padding_horizontal = section.settings.tags_padding_horizontal  
  assign tags_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.tags_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign tags_padding_vertical = section.settings.tags_padding_vertical  
  assign tags_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.tags_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign tags_radius = section.settings.tags_radius
  assign tags_border_thickness = section.settings.tags_border_thickness
  assign tags_mt = section.settings.tags_mt
  assign tags_mt_mobile = section.settings.tags_mt_mobile
  assign tags_border_color = section.settings.tags_border_color

  assign bottom_main_text_custom = section.settings.bottom_main_text_custom
  assign bottom_main_text_font = section.settings.bottom_main_text_font
  assign bottom_main_text_size = section.settings.bottom_main_text_size
  assign bottom_main_text_size_mobile = section.settings.bottom_main_text_size_mobile
  assign bottom_main_text_height = section.settings.bottom_main_text_height
  assign bottom_main_text_color = section.settings.bottom_main_text_color
  assign bottom_main_text_active_color = section.settings.bottom_main_text_active_color
  assign bottom_main_text_mt = section.settings.bottom_main_text_mt
  assign bottom_main_text_mt_mobile = section.settings.bottom_main_text_mt_mobile

  assign bottom_text_custom = section.settings.bottom_text_custom
  assign bottom_text_font = section.settings.bottom_text_font
  assign bottom_text_size = section.settings.bottom_text_size
  assign bottom_text_size_mobile = section.settings.bottom_text_size_mobile
  assign bottom_text_height = section.settings.bottom_text_height
  assign bottom_text_color = section.settings.bottom_text_color
  assign bottom_text_mt = section.settings.bottom_text_mt
  assign bottom_text_mt_mobile = section.settings.bottom_text_mt_mobile

  assign loading_attribute = 'lazy'
  unless lazy
    assign loading_attribute = 'eiger'
  endunless
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ badge_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ caption_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ tags_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ bottom_main_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ bottom_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .before-after-toggles-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: {{ toggles_gap_mobile }}px;
    max-width: fit-content;
    margin: 0 auto;
    margin-top: {{ toggles_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .before-after-toggles-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 20px;
    overflow-x: scroll;
    scrollbar-width: none;
    padding: 10px;
  }

  .before-after-toggle-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 0.5; 
    aspect-ratio: 1/1;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    width: {{ toggle_size_mobile }}px;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    position: relative;
  }

  .before-after-toggle-{{ section.id }}.active {
    opacity: 1;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .before-after-toggle-{{ section.id }} img,
  .before-after-toggle-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border-radius: 50% !important;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .before-progress-circle-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none !important;
  }

  .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    flex-shrink: 0;
    display: flex;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }

  .before-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ slider_mt_mobile }}px !important;
  }

  .before-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex !important;    
    height: auto !important;
    flex-direction: column;
    border: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ card_border_color }} !important;
    border-radius: {{ card_radius }}px !important;
    overflow: hidden !important;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    background: {{ card_bg_color }};
  }

  .before-slide-image-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .before-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    height: 100%;
  }

  .before-slide-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .before-slide-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .before-slide-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }
  
  .before-image-badge-text-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 20px;
    left: 20px;
    padding: {{ badge_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ badge_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ badge_radius }}px;
    border: {{ badge_border_thickness }}px solid {{ badge_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ badge_bg_color }};
    margin: 0;    
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    font-size: {{ badge_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ badge_height }}%;
    color: {{ badge_color }};  
  }

  .before-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding: {{ content_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    height: 100%;
  }

  .before-slide-title-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
  }
  
  .before-slide-title-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;   
    text-transform: unset;
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    color: {{ title_color }};  
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    font-weight: 700;
  }
    
  .before-slide-caption-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;    
    margin-top: {{ caption_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
    text-transform: unset;
    font-size: {{ caption_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ caption_height }}%;
    color: {{ caption_color }};  
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .before-slide-tags-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    gap: 10px;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    margin-top: {{ tags_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .before-slide-tag-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ tags_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ tags_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ tags_radius }}px;
    border: {{ tags_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tags_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ tags_bg_color }};
    margin: 0;    
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    font-size: {{ tags_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ tags_height }}%;
    color: {{ tags_color }};  
  }

  .before-slide-bottom-main-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ bottom_main_text_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
  }

  .before-slide-bottom-main-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;     
    text-transform: unset;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    font-size: {{ bottom_main_text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ bottom_main_text_height }}%;
    color: {{ bottom_main_text_color }};
  }

  .before-slide-bottom-main-text-{{ section.id }} a {
    color: {{ bottom_main_text_active_color }} !important;
    text-decoration: underline;
  }

  .before-slide-bottom-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ bottom_text_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
  }

  .before-slide-bottom-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;     
    text-transform: unset;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    font-size: {{ bottom_text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ bottom_text_height }}%;
    color: {{ bottom_text_color }};
  }
  
  .before-slider-wrappper-{{ section.id }} {
    align-items: stretch !important;
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .before-after-toggles-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      gap: {{ toggles_gap }}px;
      margin-top: {{ toggles_mt }}px;
    }

    .before-after-toggles-{{ section.id }} {
      overflow-x: hidden;
    }

    .before-after-toggle-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ toggle_size }}px;
    }

    .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
    }    

    .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;       
    }

    .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }

    .before-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slider_mt }}px !important;
    }

    .before-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      display: grid !important;
      align-items: center;
      grid-template-columns: 2fr 1fr !important;
    }

    .before-image-badge-text-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ badge_padding_vertical }}px {{ badge_padding_horizontal }}px;
      font-size: {{ badge_size }}px;
    }

    .before-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ content_padding_vertical }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .before-slide-title-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ content_align }};
    }
  
    .before-slide-title-{{ section.id }} * {     
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;     
    }

    .before-slide-caption-{{ section.id }} { 
      margin-top: {{ caption_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ content_align }};
      font-size: {{ caption_size }}px;
    }

    .before-slide-tags-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ tags_mt }}px;
      justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .before-slide-tag-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ tags_padding_vertical }}px {{ tags_padding_horizontal }}px;
      font-size: {{ tags_size }}px;
    }

    .before-slide-bottom-main-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ bottom_main_text_mt }}px;    
      text-align: {{ content_align  }};
    }

    .before-slide-bottom-main-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ bottom_main_text_size }}px;
    }

    .before-slide-bottom-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ bottom_text_mt }}px;    
      text-align: {{ content_align  }};
    }

    .before-slide-bottom-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ bottom_text_size }}px;
    }
  }

  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if badge_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-image-badge-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ badge_font.family }}, {{ badge_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ badge_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ badge_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-slide-title-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if caption_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-slide-caption-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ caption_font.family }}, {{ caption_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ caption_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ caption_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if tags_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-slide-tag-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ tags_font.family }}, {{ tags_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ tags_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ tags_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if bottom_main_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-slide-bottom-main-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ bottom_main_text_font.family }}, {{ bottom_main_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ bottom_main_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ bottom_main_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if bottom_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-slide-bottom-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ bottom_text_font.family }}, {{ bottom_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ bottom_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ bottom_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9);
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
      margin-top: 10px;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }

    .before-after-toggles-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
      margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .before-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .before-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .before-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .before-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .before-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
      }
    }
    
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }  
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }    
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
     @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% comment %} PREVIEW {% endcomment %}
<style>
  .before-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .swiper-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .before-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .before-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .before-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .before-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    margin-left: 40px;
  } 


  @media(min-width: 1024px) {
    .before-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .before-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: 40px;
    } 

    .before-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .before-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      width: calc(100% / (40px));
    }
  }
</style>

{% if autoplay %}
  <style>    
    .before-progress-circle-{{ section.id }} {
      position: absolute;
      display: block !important;
      top: -4%;
      left: -4%;
      width: 110% !important;
      height: 110% !important;
      margin: auto;
      z-index: 1;
      transform: rotate(-90deg);
    }

    .before-background-{{ section.id }} {
      stroke: {{ circle_color }};
    }

    .before-progress-{{ section.id }} {
      stroke: {{ circle_active_color }};
      stroke-dasharray: 283;
      stroke-dashoffset: 283;
    }

    .before-after-toggle-{{ section.id }}.active .before-progress-{{ section.id }} {
      -webkit-animation: stroke{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ toggles_autoplay_delay }}s linear;
      animation: stroke{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ toggles_autoplay_delay }}s linear;   
    }
    
    @keyframes stroke{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
      0% {
        stroke-dashoffset: 283;
      }
      100% {      
        stroke-dashoffset: 0;
      }
    }

    .before-after-toggle-{{ section.id }}.static-active .before-progress-{{ section.id }} {
      stroke-dasharray: 0;
      stroke-dashoffset: 0;
      opacity: 0;
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-progress-circle-{{ section.id }} {
        width: 110% !important;
        height: 110% !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% for block in section.blocks %}
  {% case block.type %}
     {% when 'heading' %}
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

        .before-heading-{{ block.id }} {
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt_mobile }}px;
          text-align: {{ block.settings.heading_align_mobile }};
        }

        .before-heading-{{ block.id }} * {          
          margin: 0;            
          font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.heading_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.heading_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          text-decoration: none;
          word-break: break-word;
        }          

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          .before-heading-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt }}px;
            text-align: {{ block.settings.heading_align }};
          }

          .before-heading-{{ block.id }} * {                
            font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size }}px;
          }  
        }
      </style>

      {% if block.settings.heading_custom %}
        <style>
          .before-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.heading_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.heading_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.heading_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.heading_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

      
  {% endcase %}
{% endfor %}


<div class="section-{{ section.id }} before-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      {% for block in section.blocks %}
        {% if block.type == 'heading' %}
          {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
            <div class="before-heading-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.heading }}</div>
          {% endif %}
        {% endif %}
      {% endfor %}
      <div class="before-after-toggles-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
        <button class="before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
        </button>
        <div class="before-after-toggles-{{ section.id }}">        
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            {% if block.type == 'card' %}
              <div class="before-after-toggle-{{ section.id }}" id="{{ block.id }}">
                <svg class="before-progress-circle-{{ section.id }}" viewBox="0 0 100 100" data-id="{{ block.id }}">
                  <circle class="before-background-{{ section.id }}" cx="50" cy="50" r="45" stroke-width="5" fill="none" />
                  <circle class="before-progress-{{ section.id }}" cx="50" cy="50" r="45" stroke-width="5" fill="none" />
                </svg>
                {% if block.settings.toggle_image != blank %}
                  {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                    {{ block.settings.toggle_image | image_url: width: 535 | image_tag:
                      loading: loading_attribute,
                      width: block.settings.toggle_image.width,
                      height: block.settings.toggle_image.height,
                      sizes: sizes,
                      widths: '535, 750, 1070, 1500'
                    }}                     
                {% else %}
                  {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                {% endif %} 
              </div>
            {% endif %}
          {% endfor %}      
        </div>
        <button class="before-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
        </button>   
      </div>

      <div class="before-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
        <div class="before-slider-wrappper-{{ section.id }} swiper-wrapper">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            {% if block.type == 'card' %}
              <div class="before-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide" data-id="{{ block.id }}">
                <div class="before-slide-image-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
                  <div class="before-slide-image-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.before_image != blank %}
                      {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                        {{ block.settings.before_image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                          loading: loading_attribute,
                          width: block.settings.before_image.width,
                          height: block.settings.before_image.height,
                          sizes: sizes,
                          widths: '535, 750, 1070, 1500'
                        }}                     
                    {% else %}
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    {% endif %} 
                    {% if block.settings.before_text != blank %}
                      <p class="before-image-badge-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.before_text }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>
                  <div class="before-slide-image-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.after_image != blank %}
                      {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                        {{ block.settings.after_image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                          loading: loading_attribute,
                          width: block.settings.after_image.width,
                          height: block.settings.after_image.height,
                          sizes: sizes,
                          widths: '535, 750, 1070, 1500'
                        }}                     
                    {% else %}
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    {% endif %} 
                    {% if block.settings.after_text != blank %}
                      <p class="before-image-badge-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.after_text }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div class="before-slide-content-{{ section.id }}">
                  <div class="before-slide-top-content-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                      <div class="before-slide-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.caption != blank %}
                      <p class="before-slide-caption-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.caption }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.tags != blank %}
                      {% assign tags = block.settings.tags | strip | split: ',' %}     
                      <div class="before-slide-tags-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% for tag in tags %}
                          <p class="before-slide-tag-{{ section.id }}">{{ tag }}</p>
                        {% endfor %}  
                      </div>        
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>                
                  <div class="before-slide-bottom-content-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.bottom_main_text != blank %}
                      <div class="before-slide-bottom-main-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.bottom_main_text }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.bottom_text != blank %}
                      <div class="before-slide-bottom-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.bottom_text }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>                 
                </div>
              </div>
            {% endif %}
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@8/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initBeforeAfterImage12() {
    document.querySelector(`.before-slider-{{ section.id }}`).classList.remove('preview');
    document.querySelector(`.before-after-toggles-{{ section.id }}`).classList.remove('preview');

    const toggles = document.querySelectorAll(`.before-after-toggle-{{ section.id }}`);
    const slides = document.querySelectorAll(`.before-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-slide`);

    function updateActiveToggle(activeIndex) {
      const activeSlide = slides[activeIndex];
      const activeId = activeSlide.getAttribute('data-id');
      toggles.forEach(toggle => {
        if (toggle.id === activeId) {
          toggle.classList.add('active');
        } else {
          toggle.classList.remove('active');
        }
      });
    }

    const mainSlider = new Swiper(`.before-slider-{{ section.id }}`, {
      speed: 300,
      loop: true,
      slidesPerView: 1,
      spaceBetween: 16,
      {% if autoplay %}
        autoplay: {
          delay: {{ toggles_autoplay_delay }}000,
        },
      {% endif %}
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.before-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.before-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
      },
      on: {
        slideChange: function () {
          updateActiveToggle(this.realIndex);
        }
      }
    });

    updateActiveToggle(mainSlider.realIndex);

    toggles.forEach((toggle) => {
      toggle.addEventListener('click', function () {
        toggles.forEach(otherToggle => otherToggle.classList.add('static-active'))
        const targetId = this.id;
        const targetIndex = [...slides].findIndex(slide => slide.getAttribute('data-id') === targetId);
        if (targetIndex !== -1) {
          mainSlider.slideToLoop(targetIndex);
        }
      });
    });
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initBeforeAfterImage12);

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initBeforeAfterImage12);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initBeforeAfterImage12);
  }
</script>

bottom_main_text_active_color.label: Additional information link
bottom_main_text_active_color.description: Use the link to see the color

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
